name: Iptables
description: Administration tool for IPv4/IPv6 packet filtering and NAT

Basic Commands.val: List all rules in the selected chain with verbose and numeric output

Extensions.val: Match source IP in the specified range

Examples.key: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m iprange --src-range x.x.x.x-x.x.x.x --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
Examples.val: Allow incoming traffic on SSH from IP in the specified range
